description: Hakodate is a relaxing city to visit. Closely surrounded by water, the seafood here is something you must try. Mount Hakodate is a must visit, known as one of the three best night views in Japan.
locations: Hakodate morning market, Fort Goryokaku, Mt. Hakodate, Russian Orthodox Church, foot baths
foods: Seafood - sushi, seafood dons, grilled fish
